data.text: @greg_travis Anything but ending up on a ventilator is within this "mild" range. Normal people just wouldn't think ending up in a hospital for a viral infection is still considered mild.  Me included. But unless you're almost dead, it's "mild".

@greg_travis believe nothing of what you hear 
and half of what you see

@greg_travis And LongCovid is “rare.” 

“In our hospital..the number of kids/adolescents who were diagnosed with a post-Covid condition this month is already more than 3x higher than what we experienced in the summer months. Other countries are seeing similar trends." https://t.co/cftKYNZzGZ
